title: Biden’s Tulsa Racism | Guests: Gov. Greg Abbott & Sen. Mike Lee | 6/2/21
description:
President Biden claimed that black entrepreneurs don’t have access to accountants or lawyers. Glenn sets the record straight about the Tulsa race massacre. Texas Gov. Greg Abbott clears up misinformation about the state’s new voting bill and his response to Texas Democrats walking out of a vote on it, and he gives a major update in his battle against the border crisis. Sen. Mike Lee joins to talk about the Endless Frontier Act and why it’s a Marxist's dream, and also the latest on the cyberattack against meatpacking company JBS. Ellie Kemper, actress from "The Office," is being canceled for an old pageant appearance. Should conservatives fight for her? Dr. Fauci is writing a book, and Stu has some thoughts.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
